<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_entry"><sys_transform_entry action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><choice_action>create</choice_action><coalesce>true</coalesce><coalesce_case_sensitive>false</coalesce_case_sensitive><coalesce_empty_fields>true</coalesce_empty_fields><date_format>yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss</date_format><map display_value="Transform Cost Centers">531f2aaa47aa995096fcb777746d430c</map><reference_value_field/><source_field>valid_to_date</source_field><source_script><![CDATA[answer = (function transformEntry(source) {

	var gdt = new GlideDateTime();
	gdt.setDisplayValue(source.valid_to_date); // the date field from your source / import. Example: source.date
	var dateTime = gdt.getDisplayValue(); //this will give you the date/time value
	return dateTime; // return the value to be put into the target field
	
})(source);]]></source_script><source_table>sn_sap_data_int_cc_stg</source_table><sys_class_name>sys_transform_entry</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Midhat</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-10-18 06:51:21</sys_created_on><sys_id>243fb6aa47ea995096fcb777746d43a8</sys_id><sys_mod_count>15</sys_mod_count><sys_name>valid_to_date</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Primary Data Integration with SAP" source="sn_sap_data_int">93c7f5cb875a1950fd73642d0ebb3590</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Primary Data Integration with SAP">93c7f5cb875a1950fd73642d0ebb3590</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_entry_243fb6aa47ea995096fcb777746d43a8</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Varun</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-04-24 10:24:34</sys_updated_on><target_field>valid_to</target_field><target_table>cmn_cost_center</target_table><use_source_script>false</use_source_script></sys_transform_entry></record_update>
